description: System-generated unique identifier for this budget record.
References the financial account or cost center the budget applies to; likely a foreign key to the chart of accounts or internal cost center table—confirm with SME.
Links the budget to a specific fiscal year period; foreign key to a budget year dimension.
Workflow state of the budget (e.g., Draft, Open, Closed) used to control editing and spending actions.
Original approved budgeted amount for the period in the system’s base currency.
Cumulative net adjustments to the original budget from approved amendments or transfers.
Funds reserved against the budget for committed spend (e.g., purchase orders or contracts) not yet posted as actuals.
Identifier of the user who created the record.
Timestamp when the record was created (system time, timezone per application settings).
Identifier of the user who last updated the record.
Timestamp of the most recent update to the record.
